snippet.title: 24 Killers Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
24 Killers out now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1668310/24_Killers/

Out in the Indian Ocean somewhere a multiverse spanning drama is unfolding. You play as Home, a cursed super intelligence bound to a soldier's corpse by an alien named Moon. Care for the inhabitants of a tiny island, cure your curse, and capture as many Whispers as you can. You're gonna need them!

Follow Happy Shabby Games on twitter.
https://twitter.com/happyshabbygame

Join our Discord.
https://discord.com/invite/n9PWqv3
